game.shortDescriptionEn: Fapout 69 â˜¢ï¸ is an adult visual novel set in a ruined wasteland. As the new owner of a brothel-haven, you must rebuild, recruit girls, fend off raiders and mutants, and turn desire into the most valuable currency: survival through pleasure.
